pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Aquatic Foliage, 1 Lily Pad, 2 Pointed Dripstone, 1 Empty Upgrade Packet, 225 Sun value.

pages.title: âœ‚ Crowd Controller
pages.text: $(#25228d)Shoots piercing thorns; Prioritizes flying and hatless zombies.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Aquatic. Prioritizes flying zombies, then the strongest Zombie without headwear
$(br)$(#bd951a)"Woof!" says Cattail. "Woof woof woof! Does this confuse you? Do you expect me to say 'Meow' like a cat because I look like a cat? I refuse to be pigeonholed."
